snippet: A pair of government reports offered investors more encouragement that the economic recovery would continue.
abstract: Stocks make sharp gains following pair of government reports on hiring and spending at retail businesses that offered investors encouragement that economic recovery will continue.
lead_paragraph: A pair of government reports offered investors more encouragement that the economic recovery would continue.

headline.main: Shares Rise Broadly After Upbeat Reports On Retailing and Jobs
